name: deviantDARKv2.6
description:
Version 2 of devinantDARK, now much more closely matching the deviantART visual style, while continuing the dark grey color scheme.

This version is a lot lighter then the origional version, which reduces contrast while making everything easier to read (dark on light, rather then light on dark)

Most of the images have been replaced with matching versions, and the fixes for the dA gallery is included.
